short_summary: Insights Discovery virtual workshops and Insights Discovery Virtual Material Packages
description: The client needs employees to build greater understanding themselves and their colleagues so that they can have more respectful, productive and positive relationships. They want to create a common language to help identify strengths and address weaknesses so that individuals and teams can perform at their highest level.

full_summary:
**Insights Discovery Virtual Workshops and Virtual Material Packages Service Tender**

### Tender Information

* **Tender Title** : Insights Discovery Virtual Workshops and Insights Discovery Virtual Material Packages
* **Reference Number** : PW-23-01024869
* **Amendment Number** : 1
* **Solicitation Number** : 100021637
* **Publication Date** : February 7, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date** : February 22, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date** : None
* **Expected Contract End Date** : None
* **Current Tender Status** : Expired

### Service Description

The Government of Canada's Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) department has issued a tender for the delivery of Insights Discovery virtual workshops and Insights Discovery Virtual Material Packages to support the development of the Service Canada - Atlantic Region's employees.

The primary objective of this project is to build greater understanding, respect, and productivity among employees by helping them identify their strengths and areas for improvement. By understanding their own and others' preferences, employees can take simple, practical actions to improve their everyday relationships.

The required services and materials include:

* Delivery of Insights Discovery virtual workshops
* Provision of Insights Discovery Virtual Material Packages

### Key Dates

* Initial contract period: From date of contract award to March 31, 2024
* Maximum two additional one-year option periods

### Tender Requirements

* **Procurement Category** : Service
* **Notice Type** : Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method** : Competitive - Open bidding
* **Regions of Opportunity** : Canada
* **Regions of Delivery** : Prince Edward Island, Newfoundland and Labrador, Nova Scotia, New Brunswick
* **Trade Agreements** : The tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* **Contracting Entity** : Employment and Social Development Canada
* **Contact Information** : Linda Handregan nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca

### Tender Document

The complete tender document is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/07/b6a596ede8039661ce01065c2934e507/rfp_100021637-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/07
